name: Required Message validation test for one field
description: The test sets the value with the wrong data type in the field. After approval, it checks the text under the field, which informs about the correctness of the type of data entered
descriptionHtml: The test sets the value with the wrong data type in the field. After approval, it checks the text under the field, which informs about the correctness of the type of data entered
